scripts.dev:backend: node -e "const {spawn}=require('child_process'); const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); const pyWin=path.join('backend','venv','Scripts','python.exe'); const pyNix=path.join('backend','venv','bin','python'); const py=fs.existsSync(pyWin)?pyWin:(fs.existsSync(pyNix)?pyNix:'python'); const p=spawn(py,['backend/app.py'],{stdio:'inherit'}); p.on('exit',c=>process.exit(c));"
scripts.dev: concurrently -n FRONTEND,BACKEND "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:backend"
